description:
Retinomax products provide a broad range of refraction and keratometry measurements with great mobility, stability, and accuracy that are well-known throughout the world.

Combining the features of keratometry and autorefraction in a handheld instrument, the Visionix Handheld Autorefractor Keratometer is an innovative advancement in the field of ophthalmic technology. The unparalleled ease of measuring corneal curvature and refractive errors is made possible by this tool for eye care practitioners.

Precise measurements are ensured by the Autorefractor Keratometer, which provides precise prescription determination and cataract testing. With the efficiency of this technology, eye exams are conducted more quickly and accurately. It promotes better patient care and increased flexibility in various clinical settings because it is a portable and adaptable diagnostic tool.

The innovative Handheld Autorefractor Keratometer has revolutionized pediatric ophthalmology. It specializes in treating visual problems and eye ailments in children at a young age. To ensure precise diagnosis and effective treatments, skilled professionals utilize kid-friendly techniques.
name: Hand-Held Auto Refractor Keratometer
